casebody.data:
IN RE H.C. No. COA05-1349. North Carolina Court of Appeals. Filed July 5, 2006. Certification Date July 25, 2006. Appeal from Lee (04J91, 04J92, 01J52).

Case without published opinion. Affirmed as to the denial of the new trial motion and adjudication of neglect and dependency as to grandfather. Reversed as to the adjudication of neglect and dependency as to the grandmother.
